blogPost.excerpt: At the Technically True Podcast, we talk about developer relations in early-stage startups, building communities around a product, and getting started with the different facets of developer experience.
blogPost.body: At the Technically True Podcast, we talk about developer relations in early-stage startups, building communities around a product, and getting started with the different facets of developer experience.
blogPost.title: Technically True Podcast - A podcast on developer relations and public speaking
blogPost.author: Nicolas Grenié

localize.description: 在Technically True Podcast上，我们讨论了早期创业公司中的开发者关系，围绕产品建立社区，以及从开发者体验的不同方面入手。
localize.tagline: 一个关于开发商关系和公共演讲的播客

localize.description: 在Technically True Podcast上，我們討論了早期創業公司中的開發者關係，圍繞產品建立社區，以及從開發者體驗的不同方面入手。
localize.tagline: 一個關於開發商關係和公共演講的播客

previous.excerpt: See who viewed your content instantly. Along with total view count, you can also see the total percentage viewed by users on screen recordings, videos, and images. These analytics will allow you to focus on creating content with higher engagement
previous.title: Analytics from CloudApp - See who’s watching and engaging with your content

localize.description: 即时查看谁浏览了你的内容。除了总浏览次数，你还可以看到用户对屏幕录像、视频和图片的总浏览百分比。这些分析可以让你专注于创建具有更高参与度的内容。
localize.tagline: 查看谁在观看和参与你的内容。

localize.description: 即時查看誰瀏覽了你的內容。除了總瀏覽次數，你還可以看到用戶對屏幕錄像、視頻和圖片的總瀏覽百分比。這些分析可以讓你專注於創建具有更高參與度的內容。
localize.tagline: 查看誰在觀看和參與你的內容。

next.excerpt: Want to decide which devices Amazon builds next? Check out the video above to learn how you can play a part in innovation at Amazon.
next.title: Amazon Build It - Help make your favorite device ideas real

localize.description: 想决定亚马逊下一步打造哪些设备吗？请看上面的视频，了解你如何在亚马逊的创新中发挥作用。
localize.tagline: 帮助您实现您最喜欢的设备想法

localize.description: 想決定亞馬遜下一步打造哪些設備嗎？請看上面的視頻，瞭解你如何在亞馬遜的創新中發揮作用。
localize.tagline: 幫助您實現您最喜歡的設備想法
